metadata.title: CVE-2021-39880 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A Denial Of Service vulnerability in the apollo_upload_server Ruby gem inGitLab CE/EE all versions starting from 11.9 before 14.0.9, all versionsstarting from 14.1 before 14.1.4, and all versions starting from 14.2before 14.2.2 allows an attacker to deny access to all users via speciallycrafted requests to the apollo_upload_server middleware.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
